Text:
Thanks very much for the up. 
This is a Classic a simple movie made extraordinary by the tunes woven into it. IMHO arguably the greatest movie soundtrack ever.
Especially if you were a young guy growing up in the sixties .............I thank my god ......that I did.

hi twentyforty

I could not log in and could not find any comment i wrote before to you, (to see if i used the right username). strange!
so now i want to thank you for everything from the past weeks.
ncis and cm! sorry for not thanking you before!

mary

@uisge-beatha: Thanks. It is the classic, almost thirty years old and I was afraid that technical quality of DVD isn't good enough for today's standards. So, I've tried to make decent encoding and to some extension I've manage it... anyway, sorry if some people find this below my usual quality....

@mary: Do not worry, I knew that you were here. Thank you for finding the time to say "Thanks", lot of people seems to forget that.

Well what can I say thanks for a great movie
:-D
